articles.content:

articles.title: Canada keeps airspace open to Russian airliners for now - Canada News - Castanet.net
articles.description: Russian airliners continue to fly through Canadian skies after several European countries shut their airspace to Russian carriers in response to Moscow's invasion of Ukraine – but Ottawa is keeping all options on the table.
